Notes.Text:
This update for Mesa fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-5068: Fixed exploitable shared memory permissions vulnerability (bsc#1156015).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: An exploitable shared memory permissions vulnerability exists in the functionality of X11 Mesa 3D Graphics Library 19.1.2. An attacker can access the shared memory without any specific permissions to trigger this vulnerability.
